note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Cj-change-howdy
body:
### Wordpress Plugin by CJ
If you are looking for a way to change the **Howdy** text in the admin bar, then you are in the right place.

Change the Howdy text to *whatever you wish*, right from the admin panel!

```
http://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/cj-change-howdy/
```
tagline: A slick WP plugin that lets you change the "Howdy" text.
